name: Araf
description:
Woke up as a bat today

Frightened as I did, yes

Woke up as a bat today

With all the deeds I did


Controls

Use your mouse/touch to flap your wings.
Slight horizontal movements result in slight horizontal movements.

Try to run away by pressing longer to the screen.

Don't fall, don't die, don't go.




Made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022.

Sources used:

I used remaxim's and Luke.RUSTLTD's wind sounds from OpenGameArt.

Both can be found here:

https://opengameart.org/content/short-wind-sound

https://opengameart.org/content/wind1

The trees are from the Free Trees asset from Unity Asset Store.

It can be found here:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/free-trees-103208#desc...

I have also used DOTween's free edition.

It can be found here:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676
